Your next attack this turn gains +1 [Power].

Whenever an attack hits a hero this turn, create a Frostbite token under their control.

**Go again**

**Go again**

card.name: Aether Wildfire
card.text:
Deal 4 arcane damage to target opposing hero.

If Aether Wildfire is played during an opponents turn, until end of turn, action card effects that deal arcane damage instead deal that much arcane damage plus X, where X is the damage dealt by Aether Wildfire.

card.name: Emeritus Scolding
card.text: Deal 4 arcane damage to target hero. If Emeritus Scolding is played during an opponents turn, instead deal 6 arcane damage to target hero.
card.flavour: "I may look frail, but my mind will CRUSH you!" - Efaris Brittlebone

card.name: Pry
card.text:
Target hero reveals 3 cards from their hand. If Pry is played during an opponents turn, instead they reveal all cards in their hand.

You may choose a card revealed this way. If you do, that hero puts it on the bottom of their deck then draws a card.

card.name: Pry
card.text:
Target hero reveals 2 cards from their hand. If Pry is played during an opponents turn, instead they reveal all cards in their hand.

You may choose a card revealed this way. If you do, that hero puts it on the bottom of their deck then draws a card.

card.flavour: "Guaranteed to heal everything except a broken heart." - Jezabelle, Everfest Healer and Allsorts

card.name: Ironhide Helm
card.text: When you defend with Ironhide Helm, you may pay [1 Resource]. If you do, it gains +2[Defense] and destroy it when the combat chain closes. *(When an equipment is destroyed, it's put into the graveyard.)*

card.name: Ironhide Plate
card.text: When you defend with Ironhide Plate, you may pay [1 Resource]. If you do, it gains +2[Defense] and destroy it when the combat chain closes. *(When an equipment is destroyed, it's put into the graveyard.)*

card.flavour: "Every story has an ending. I wonder, what shall yours be?" - Kirigami

card.name: Iyslander, Stormbind
card.text:
**Essence of Ice** *(You may have Ice cards in your deck.)*

If it's not your turn, you may play blue 'non-attack' action cards from your arsenal as though they were an instant.

Whenever you play an Ice card during an opponent's turn, create a Frostbite token under their control.

card.name: Iyslander
card.text:

If it's not your turn, you may play a 'non-attack' action cards with blue color strips from your arsenal as though they were an instant.

Whenever you play an Ice card during an opponents turn, create a Frostbite token under their control.

card.name: Encase
card.text:
**Ice Fusion** *(As an additional cost to play Encase, you may reveal an Ice card from your hand.)*

Deal 3 arcane damage to any target. If Encase was **fused** and deals damage to a hero, **freeze** that hero and all equipment they control until the start of your next turn. *(A frozen object can't be played or activated.)*

card.text:
**Ice Fusion** *(As an additional cost to play Freezing Point, you may reveal an Ice card from your hand.)*

*(An affliction enters the arena under an opposing hero's control.)*

Frostbites you control have "At the beginning of your end phase, this deals 1 arcane damage to you."

card.name: Coronet Peak

card.name: Glacial Horns
card.text: **Action** - Destroy Glacial Horns: Choose a hero. **Freeze** up to 1 card in their arsenal and 1 ally they control until the start of your next turn. **Go again** *(A frozen object can't be played or activated.)*

card.name: Channel the Bleak Expanse
card.text:
**Go again**

Heroes can't draw cards, reveal cards, or search decks from effects.

**Channel Ice** - At the beginning of your end phase, put a flow counter on Channel the Bleak Expanse then destroy it unless you put an Ice card from your pitch zone on the bottom of your deck for each flow counter on it.

card.name: Hypothermia
card.text:
*(An affliction enters the arena under an opposing hero's control.)*

Attacks you control can't gain **go again**. *(This does not affect attacks that naturally have go again.)*

At the beginning of your end phase, destroy Hypothermia.

card.name: Insidious Chill
card.text:
Insidious Chill enters the arena with 3 frost counters on it. When it has no frost counters on it, destroy it.

Whenever you **Ice Fuse**, remove a frost counter from Insidious Chill. If you do, target hero discards a card unless they pay [2 resource].

card.name: Isenhowl Weathervane
card.text:
The next time you **Ice fuse** this turn, create 4 Frostbite tokens under target hero's control.

**Go again**

card.name: Isenhowl Weathervane
card.text:
The next time you **Ice fuse** this turn, create 3 Frostbite tokens under target hero's control.

**Go again**

card.name: Isenhowl Weathervane
card.text:
The next time you **Ice fuse** this turn, create 2 Frostbite tokens under target hero's control.

**Go again**

card.name: Arctic Incarceration
card.text: Create 3 Frostbite tokens under target hero's control.
card.flavour: Tales be told, the kiss of an ice nymph draws the last breath from a soul lost to the Bleak Expanse.

card.name: Arctic Incarceration
card.text: Create 2 Frostbite tokens under target hero's control.

card.name: Cold Snap
card.text:
Target hero may pay [3 resource]. If they don't, **freeze** a card in their arsenal or an ally they control until the start of your next turn. *(A frozen object can't be played or activated.)*

If Cold Snap is played from arsenal, draw a card.

**Go again**

card.name: Cold Snap

card.name: Silent Stilettos
card.text:
Whenever an attacking ally you control dies or an attack action card you control is destroyed by **phantasm**, you may pay [3 resource]. If you do, destroy Silent Stilettos and gain 1 action point.

**Arcane Barrier 1** *(If your hero would be dealt arcane damage, you may pay [resource] to prevent 1 of that damage.)*

card.name: Transmogrify
card.text:
The next attack action card you play this turn is Illusionist, has 8 base [attack], and gains **phantasm**. *(It keeps its other card types.)*

**Go again**

card.name: Transmogrify
card.text:
The next attack action card you play this turn is Illusionist, has 6 base [attack], and gains **phantasm**. *(It keeps its other card types.)*

**Go again**

card.name: Waning Moon
card.text: **Once per Turn Instant** - [2 resource]: Deal 2 arcane damage to target hero. If it's not your turn, instead deal 3 arcane damage to them. Activate this ability only if you've played a 'non-attack' action card this turn.

card.name: Alluvion Constellas
card.text:
The first time Alluvion Constellas prevents arcane damage each turn, if it has less than 4 energy counters, you may put an energy counter on it.

**Instant** - Remove 2 energy counters from Alluvion Constellas: The next staff ability you activate this turn costs [3 resource] less.

**Arcane Barrier 1** *(If your hero would be dealt arcane damage, you may pay [resource] to prevent 1 of that damage.)*

card.name: Spellfire Cloak
card.text:
**Instant** - Destroy Spellfire Cloak: Gain [resource]. Activate this ability only during an opponent's turn.

**Arcane Barrier 1** *(If your hero would be dealt arcane damage, you may pay [resource] to prevent 1 of that damage.)*

card.name: Tome of Duplicity
card.text: Look at the top 2 cards of your deck, then banish one. If it's a 'non-attack' action card, you may play it this turn as though it were an instant.
card.flavour: What intent lies bemeath the pages?

card.name: Oasis Respite
card.text: Prevent the next 4 damage that would be dealt to target hero this turn by a source of your choice. If they have less life than each other hero, they may gain 1 [life].

card.flavour: In the Savage Lands, humans, like animals, are more dangerous when they bleed.
